com.myronmarston.music.notation
Interface NotationElement

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNotationElement, Clef, Instrument, KeySignature, NotationDynamic, NotationElementList, NotationNote, Part, PartSection, TimeSignature, Tuplet
public interface NotationElement

Interface that represents an element of musical notation.

Method Summary
 long getLargestDurationDenominator()
          Gets the largest duration denominator of this element.
 java.util.List<NotationNote> getNotationNotes()
          Gets a list of notation notes owned by this element and all owned elements.

          Scales the durations of this element by multiplying the durations by the given factor.

          Indicates whether or not duration scaling is supported.

          Gets the representation of this element in the string format used by Guido.

java.lang.String toLilypondString()
Gets the representation of this element in the string format used by lilypond.

Returns:
the lilypond representation of this element

toGuidoString

java.lang.String toGuidoString()
Gets the representation of this element in the string format used by Guido.

Returns:
the guido representation of this element

supportsDurationScaling

boolean supportsDurationScaling()
Indicates whether or not duration scaling is supported. If true is returned, getLargestDurationDenominator() and scaleDurations() should both work properly without throwing an UnsupportedOperationException.

Returns:
whether or not duration scaling is supported on this element

getLargestDurationDenominator

long getLargestDurationDenominator()
Gets the largest duration denominator of this element.

Returns:
the largest duration denominator

scaleDurations

void scaleDurations(long scaleFactor)
Scales the durations of this element by multiplying the durations by the given factor.

Parameters:
scaleFactor - the factor to multiply the durations by; should be a power of two

getNotationNotes

java.util.List<NotationNote> getNotationNotes()
Gets a list of notation notes owned by this element and all owned elements.

Returns:
list of notation notes
